data.actual_result: The text appears linked to the "enable overlay"
data.expected_result: IF the overlay updates, it should show separately from "enable overlay"
data.short_description: Updating the overlay if you have it disabled by by default shows "updating" directly next to "enable overlay"
data.steps_to_repro: - This bug can ONLY be reproduced if you've had the overlay off for a while, you will only have 1 shot at reproducing this until the overlay gets updated - Open User Settings > Overlay - Enable the overlay
